articles.description: "I will finish what I started."
articles.content:
Udonis Haslem will return for his 20th season with the Miami Heat this fall. (Michael Reaves/Getty Images)
Udonis Haslem isnt done just yet.

articles.author: Morgan Campbell
articles.title: Usyk’s Heavyweight Win Sets Up Fury Showdown or More Boxing Messiness - The New York Times
articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk beat Anthony Joshua and dedicated his fight to Ukraine, his home country at war with Russia. He wants to fight Tyson Fury, who looms as a retired champion with unclear plans.
articles.content: Less than two weeks before that bout, the U.S. Treasury Department announced a crackdown against Daniel Kinahan, the reputed head of an Irish drug cartel and a boxing power broker who has advised Fur… [+798 chars]
